Definition.WordDefinition: Aha! an exclamation of ridicule (Ps. 35:21; 40:15; 70:3). In Isa. 44:16 it signifies joyful surprise, as also in Job 39:25, R.V.

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Aha \A*ha"\, interj. [Ah, interj. + ha.] An exclamation expressing, by different intonations, triumph, mixed with derision or irony, or simple surprise. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Aha \A*ha"\, n. A sunk fence. See {Ha-ha}. --Mason. [1913 Webster]
